Synopsis: Playboy Thomas Fuentes (Eduardo Verástegui) has so far been able to skate by in life on good looks and charm alone. But when his duplicitous relationships with three women -- impassioned waitress Cici (Sofía Vergara), meticulous lawyer Lorena (Roselyn Sánchez) and bored socialite Patricia (Jaci Velasquez) -- spiral out of control, he suffers a mental breakdown. His doctor recommends that he choose just one girlfriend -- but can he choose in time before they discover his deception?
Title: Chasing Papi
